hint.metricDescription: Try to minimise the number of numbers per line in the code. Too many numbers in a line make the code rather confusing and reduce its readability. For large calculations, it is therefore advisable to divide the calculation into smaller calculations and then combine them later
hint.goodCodeDescription: In this code the calculation is made in different steps in multiple lines
hint.badCodeDescription: In this code all the calculations are made in one single line
